column5: Question:  Is there a way to change the "skin" of this new format to lighter, easier to read screen for weary old eyes ? ? ?
Go right to the bottom of this page, click on "theme", then click on "default".
Lol...all I saw was FOR(um) Skin...of course I had to check out this thread.
The white is nice but I just need the font a little bigger...
Hold down the CTRL tab and tap the  +  tab to enlarge, and CTRL  tab and  -  to make smaller.
